languages.text: "Хочешь знать мое имя, мон-кай? Твой род не славится дружелюбием. Да и о чем нам говорить после того, что твои сородичи сделали с моим домом". {n}Тонкие брови эльдара сдвигаются вместе.{/n} "Впрочем, в благодарность за спасение я все же удовлетворю твое любопытство. Я — Эклендиль Маэрш, идущий Путем Провидца, Всевидящее Око и Безвременный Страж мира-корабля Крудараха. Был им. До недавних пор".

traits.locale_text: "Хочешь знать мое имя, мон-кай? Твой род не славится дружелюбием. Да и о чем нам говорить после того, что твои сородичи сделали с моим домом". {n}Тонкие брови эльдара сдвигаются вместе.{/n} "Впрочем, в благодарность за спасение я все же удовлетворю твое любопытство. Я — Эклендиль Маэрш, идущий Путем Провидца, Всевидящее Око и Безвременный Страж мира-корабля Крудараха. Был им. До недавних пор".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Do you want to know my name, mon-keigh? Your dynasty is not known for its amiability. Indeed, we have nothing to discuss after what your kin did to my home." {n}The Aeldari's thin eyebrows draw together.{/n} "But as a token of my gratitude for your saving me, I will satisfy your curiosity after all. I am Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who walks the Path of the Farseer, the All-Seeing Eye and Timeless Sentinel of the craftworld Crudarach. I was, that is. Until recently."
languages.original_text: "Хочешь знать мое имя, мон-кай? Твой род не славится дружелюбием. Я — Эклендиль Маэрш, идущий Путем Провидца, Всевидящее Око и Безвременный Страж мира-корабля Крудараха. Был им. До недавних пор".

I am Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who walks the Path of the Farseer, the All-Seeing Eye and Timeless Sentinel of the craftworld of Crudarach. I was, that is. Until recently."

I am Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who walks the Path of the Farseer, the All-Seeing Eye and Timeless Sentinel of the craftworld Crudarach. I was, that is. Until recently."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «¿Quieres saber cómo me llamo, mon-keigh? Tu dinastía no es conocida por su cordialidad. De hecho, tú y yo no tenemos nada de lo que hablar después de lo que tu especie hizo con mi hogar». {n}Las finas cejas del Aeldari se encuentran en su entrecejo fruncido.{/n} «Pero como muestra de mi gratitud por haberme salvado, satisfaré tu curiosidad al fin y al cabo. Me llamo Eklendyl Ma'ersh, caminante de la Senda del Vidente, el Ojo Omnisciente y Centinela Eterno del mundo astronave Crudarach. O al menos lo fui. Hasta hace poco».
languages.original_text: "Do you want to know my name, mon-keigh? Your dynasty is not known for its amiability. Indeed, we have nothing to discuss after what your kin did to my home." {n}The Aeldari's thin eyebrows draw together.{/n} "But as a token of my gratitude for your saving me, I will satisfy your curiosity after all. I am Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who walks the Path of the Farseer, the All-Seeing Eye and Timeless Sentinel of the craftworld Crudarach. I was, that is. Until recently."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quieres saber cómo me llamo, mon-keigh? Tu dinastía no es conocida por su cordialidad. De hecho, tú y yo no tenemos nada de lo que hablar después de lo que tu especie hizo con mi hogar». {n}Las finas cejas del Aeldari se encuentran en su entrecejo fruncido.{/n} «Pero como muestra de mi gratitud por haberme salvado, satisfaré tu curiosidad al fin y al cabo. Me llamo Eklendyl Ma'ersh, caminante de la Senda del Vidente, el Ojo Omnisciente y Centinela Eterno del mundo astronave Crudarach. O al menos lo fui. Hasta hace poco».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「私の名を知りたいか、モン＝ケイ？お前の王朝は親善で知られているわけじゃないんだからな。確かに、お前の種族が私の故郷にしたことを考えれば、我らが話すことは何もない」{n}アエルダリが細い眉を引き寄せた。{/n} 「だが、私を救ってくれたことへの感謝の印として、お前の好奇心を満足させてやるとしよう。私はエクレンディル・マエルシュ、先見司の道を歩む方舟クルダラの全智の眼とその永遠なるセンチネルだよ。最近まではそうだった、というべきだが」
languages.original_text: "Do you want to know my name, mon-keigh? Your dynasty is not known for its amiability. Indeed, we have nothing to discuss after what your kin did to my home." {n}The Aeldari's thin eyebrows draw together.{/n} "But as a token of my gratitude for your saving me, I will satisfy your curiosity after all. I am Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who walks the Path of the Farseer, the All-Seeing Eye and Timeless Sentinel of the craftworld Crudarach. I was, that is. Until recently."

traits.locale_text: 「私の名を知りたいか、モン＝ケイ？お前の王朝は親善で知られているわけじゃないんだからな。確かに、お前の種族が私の故郷にしたことを考えれば、我らが話すことは何もない」{n}アエルダリが細い眉を引き寄せた。{/n} 「だが、私を救ってくれたことへの感謝の印として、お前の好奇心を満足させてやるとしよう。私はエクレンディル・マエルシュ、先見司の道を歩む方舟クルダラの全智の眼とその永遠なるセンチネルだよ。最近まではそうだった、というべきだが」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “你想知道我的名字吗，猴子？你的王朝并不以友善著称，尤其当你的族人对我的家园做了那样的事情之后，我们恐怕没什么好说的。”{n}艾达灵族皱起了细细的眉毛。{/n}“不过，为了感激你救了我一命，我还是决定满足你的好奇心。我叫埃克伦迪·玛厄什，是位先知。我是方舟世界克鲁达拉赫的全视之眼与永恒哨兵，或者说以前是这样，直到最近的动荡到来为止。”
languages.original_text: "Do you want to know my name, mon-keigh? Your dynasty is not known for its amiability. Indeed, we have nothing to discuss after what your kin did to my home." {n}The Aeldari's thin eyebrows draw together.{/n} "But as a token of my gratitude for your saving me, I will satisfy your curiosity after all. I am Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who walks the Path of the Farseer, the All-Seeing Eye and Timeless Sentinel of the craftworld Crudarach. I was, that is. Until recently."

traits.locale_text: “你想知道我的名字吗，猴子？你的王朝并不以友善著称，尤其当你的族人对我的家园做了那样的事情之后，我们恐怕没什么好说的。”{n}艾达灵族皱起了细细的眉毛。{/n}“不过，为了感激你救了我一命，我还是决定满足你的好奇心。我叫埃克伦迪·玛厄什，是位先知。我是方舟世界克鲁达拉赫的全视之眼与永恒哨兵，或者说以前是这样，直到最近的动荡到来为止。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Vous voulez savoir mon nom, mon-keigh ? Votre dynastie n'est pas connue pour son aménité. En fait, après ce que vos semblables ont fait à mon monde, nous n'avons rien à nous dire, » {n}dit l'Aeldari en fronçant ses fins sourcils.{/n} « Mais pour vous remercier de m'avoir sauvé, je satisferai malgré tout votre curiosité. Je suis Eklendyl Ma'ersh, qui marche sur la Voie du Grand Prophète, l'Omniscient et la Sentinelle éternelle du vaisseau-monde Crudarach. Enfin, je l'étais. Jusqu'à récemment. »
languages.original_text: "Do you want to know my name, mon-keigh? Your dynasty is not known for its amiability. Indeed, we have nothing to discuss after what your kin did to my home." {n}The Aeldari's thin eyebrows draw together.{/n} "But as a token of my gratitude for your saving me, I will satisfy your curiosity after all. I am Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who walks the Path of the Farseer, the All-Seeing Eye and Timeless Sentinel of the craftworld Crudarach. I was, that is. Until recently."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez savoir mon nom, mon-keigh ? Votre dynastie n'est pas connue pour son aménité. En fait, après ce que vos semblables ont fait à mon monde, nous n'avons rien à nous dire, » {n}dit l'Aeldari en fronçant ses fins sourcils.{/n} « Mais pour vous remercier de m'avoir sauvé, je satisferai malgré tout votre curiosité. Je suis Eklendyl Ma'ersh, qui marche sur la Voie du Grand Prophète, l'Omniscient et la Sentinelle éternelle du vaisseau-monde Crudarach. Enfin, je l'étais. Jusqu'à récemment. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Ihr wollt meinen Namen wissen, Chem-Pan-Sey? Eure Dynastie ist nicht bekannt dafür, freundlich zu sein. Es gibt nichts zu besprechen nach der Schande, die Eure Art über mein Zuhause gebracht hat." {n}Die dünnen Augenbrauen des Aeldari ziehen sich zusammen.{/n} "Aber als Zeichen meiner Dankbarkeit für meine Rettung werde ich Eure Neugier stillen. Ich bin Eklendyl Ma'ersh, der den Pfad des Runenpropheten beschreitet – das Allsehende Auge und der Zeitlose Wächter des Weltenschiffs Crudarach. Das war ich zumindest mal. Bis vor Kurzem."
languages.original_text: "Do you want to know my name, mon-keigh? Your dynasty is not known for its amiability. Indeed, we have nothing to discuss after what your kin did to my home." {n}The Aeldari's thin eyebrows draw together.{/n} "But as a token of my gratitude for your saving me, I will satisfy your curiosity after all. I am Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who walks the Path of the Farseer, the All-Seeing Eye and Timeless Sentinel of the craftworld Crudarach. I was, that is. Until recently."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt meinen Namen wissen, Chem-Pan-Sey? Eure Dynastie ist nicht bekannt dafür, freundlich zu sein. Es gibt nichts zu besprechen nach der Schande, die Eure Art über mein Zuhause gebracht hat. {n}Die dünnen Augenbrauen des Aeldari ziehen sich zusammen.{/n} "Aber als Zeichen meiner Dankbarkeit für meine Rettung werde ich Eure Neugier stillen. Ich bin Eklendyl Ma'ersh, der den Pfad des Runenpropheten beschreitet – das Allsehende Auge und der Zeitlose Wächter des Weltenschiffs Crudarach. Das war ich zumindest mal. Bis vor Kurzem."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Adımı bilmek mi istiyorsun mon-keigh? Hanedanlığının pek de dost olduğu söylenemez. Soydaşlarının yuvama yaptığı onca şeyden sonra konuşacak bir şeyimiz yok." {n}Aeldari'nin ince kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "Ancak beni kurtarmana karşı duyduğum minnettarlığın göstergesi olarak merakını gidereceğim. Adım Eklendyl Ma'ersh. Ötesezenin Yolu'nda yürüyen, Her Şeyi Gören ve Crudarach gemidünyasının Ebedî Nöbetçisi'yim. Daha doğrusu kısa süre önceye kadar öyleydim."
languages.original_text: "Do you want to know my name, mon-keigh? Your dynasty is not known for its amiability. Indeed, we have nothing to discuss after what your kin did to my home." {n}The Aeldari's thin eyebrows draw together.{/n} "But as a token of my gratitude for your saving me, I will satisfy your curiosity after all. I am Eklendyl Ma'ersh, who walks the Path of the Farseer, the All-Seeing Eye and Timeless Sentinel of the craftworld Crudarach. I was, that is. Until recently."

traits.locale_text: "Adımı bilmek mi istiyorsun mon-keigh? Hanedanlığının pek de dostane tavırları olduğu söylenemez. Soydaşlarının yuvama yaptığı onca şeyden sonra konuşacak bir şeyimiz kalmadı." {n}Aeldari'nin ince kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "Ancak beni kurtarmana karşı duyduğum minnettarlığın bir göstergesi olarak merakını gidereceğim. Adım Eklendyl Ma'ersh. Ötesezen'in Yolu'nu yürüyenim, Her Şeyi Görenim ve Crudarach gemidünyasının Ebedî Nöbetçisiyim. Gerçi yakın zamana kadar öyleydim desem daha doğru olur."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
